ComicInfo.Penciller: Curt Swan,Howard Purcell,Jim Mooney,Ruben Moreira,Curt Swan,Ruben Moreira,Jim Mooney,Howard Purcell
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Man with the Strangler Hands!: John Croydon commits a series of robberies and murders. When caught by the police he tells a fantastic tale: His hands are those of a gangster who died in a jungle plane crash. A witch doctor transplanted them to Croydon, thus condemning him to a life of crime. The police prove him wrong.
The Caravan of Miracles!: Peter Farrell has traveled the world and stole all the secrets behind miracles like the Indian rope trick and such. Putting them together for an US-American road show he is haunted by mystics. Farrell, however, is only hallucinating.
Double Mourning!: An Illinois girl possesses the memories of a dead child.
The Man Who Was Death!: Fred Jones believes that his touch causes death.
A Piece of Rope!: While rummaging through the house of a deceased man, reporter George Hackett finds a treasure. And commits a crime trying to get his hands on it.
Dead or Alive?: Account of an out of body experience writer Robert Louis Stevenson had in 1892.
I Was a Witch!: Leslie Cantwell visits her brother Roy in the country. The failed painter plans to drive her to suicide to inherit the family money. Husband Bruce, however, can foil the evil plot.
ComicInfo.Title: The Man with the Strangler Hands!; The Caravan of Miracles!; Double Mourning!; The Man Who Was Death!; A Piece of Rope!; Dead or Alive?; I Was a Witch!
